posts.post_title: F/S - T206s - 2 for $25 - Old Mill, Tolstoi - ALL CARDS SOLD
posts.post_content:
I've been able to upgrade some of my cards recently, so looking to sell the following T206 in fair condition for $12.50 each delivered.  Take the lot of 15 for $175.  For the first day of the listing, I'll give priority to those requesting the greatest number of cards.  I will be listing some T206 in poor and good condition as well.  Send me a PM or an email: [url]ericksummers@yahoo.com[/url]
